attributes.action: change the colour of the front door of 10 Downing Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We campaign and each pledge £1 to Children in Need 2010 if the PM agrees to paint the front door of 10 Downing Street a new and exciting colour, to be decided at a later date by fans of our Facebook page, to raise awareness of the cause supported by Children in Need.

Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=51566773879#!/group.php?v=wall&gid=105188699511081

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
